Class HttpClientProperties

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.boot.http.client.autoconfigure.HttpClientSettingsProperties
org.springframework.boot.http.client.autoconfigure.HttpClientProperties
@ConfigurationPropertiesSource public class HttpClientProperties extends HttpClientSettingsProperties
Base class for configuration properties common to both imperative and reactive HTTP clients.
Since:
4.0.0
Author:
Olga Maciaszek-Sharma, Rossen Stoyanchev, Phillip Webb
